publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-798.1 Mr Ted Brocklebank: Fisheries Council December 2003-As an amendment to motion (S2M-798) in the name of Richard Lochhead, leave out from "discriminates" to end and insert "is unjust and discriminates against Scottish fishermen and has produced, in the words of Ross Finnie, "unintended consequences" which further reduce the catching powers of the white fish fleet; commends the efforts of the Scottish Fishermen's Federation and Fishermen's Association Ltd to mount legal challenges to the agreement, and seeks urgent clarification from the European Commission on the technical adjustments to no-go areas."
